attributes.action: Stop abuse to elderly in care settings
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am writing this petition because i think that abuse in care settings should stop. Elderly people who live in care settings like in residential homes are getting abused in different ways like: Verbal abuse/threats, Racial abuse/ harassment, Sexual abuse/harassment, actual physical abuse, financial abuse and sometimes even neglect. Elderly people get this abuses in the care settings by care workers, other service users and even visitors.
